participant_1.background:
I'm going to drive my old car to the orchard and pick apples.
I check the Steelers' score from the previous night before I start my day.
I saved up my allowance for months to buy a Bruno Mars CD when I was 12 years old.
I am proud of my first home purchase.
I like to listen to music that motivates me to keep pushing forward despite my circumstances.

participant_2.background:
Yes, my home is full of love and laughter.
i hope to become a music teacher after retirement.
i hate cooking.
I will use my black purse to store my stock market reports.
I wake up and spend some time meditating before I start my day.

content.text: What did you do this morning?
I woke up and meditated for an hour, then checked the stock market before getting ready for work.
Oh nice, I checked the Steelers score from the previous night before I started my day.
I've never been to a football game, but I love watching them on TV.
You should definitely go to a game sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to do that. What's your favorite team?
I'm a big fan of the Steelers.
I've heard of them. Are they any good?
Yeah, they're pretty good. They've won a few Super Bowls.
Oh, that's cool. I might have to check them out sometime.
You definitely should!
I will.
What's your favorite music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I really like Bruno Mars.
Oh, me too! He's so good.
Yeah, he's one of my favorites.
I'm going to drive my old car to the orchard and pick apples later today.
That sounds like fun! I love apples.
Me too! I'm going to make a pie with them.
Oh, that sounds delicious.
It's my favorite.
